synopsis.text: The anime "Tonari no 801-chan" is a brief yet captivating adaptation of the original manga, featuring episodes that run for a mere 90 seconds to two minutes. The story revolves around a 28-year-old salaryman, an otaku at heart, and his 22-year-old girlfriend, a fujoshi with an obsession for yaoi. The manga, created by Kojima Ajiko, delves into their personal lives, showcasing their shared passion for otaku culture. The anime was initially released as a special feature with the fourth volume of the manga. In a delightful twist, the narrative also follows the girl's adventures as she traverses her town, engaging with friends and encountering intriguing individuals along her journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
